title: THE 5 WORST TRACTORS YOU COULD BUY THIS YEAR! TYPES AND MODELS!

tasks.task: The user discusses various tractors with sub-tasks:
subtasks: Acknowledging the sponsorship by Bora Wheel Spacers
Promoting subscription to the channel for new video notifications
Advertising the dealer's website for tractor attachments
Avoiding rental tractors and auction tractors
Avoiding tractors without front-end loaders or quick attach buckets
Avoiding older tractors if maintenance and parts availability are concerns
Opting for current manufacturers' tractors with nearby dealer support
Avoiding the Kubota B3350 due to constant issues with DPF and regen
Avoiding John Deere 2320 and 2305 models due to U-joint problems and lack of maintenance instructions
Researching online for service history and potential issues
Being cautious of deals that seem too good to be true
Considering future maintenance costs and having a support network
Ensuring compatibility of loader and quick attach systems before purchase
Mentioning the previous video on the five worst compact tractors in 2022
Addressing the different perspective of this current video

tasks.task: The video advises avoiding purchasing certain tractors and provides general considerations for buying a tractor. Specific tasks include:
